digitalRFPs.title: Cruz Azul Football Fan Engagement Mobile App
digitalRFPs.description: Seeking experienced digital agency to develop comprehensive football mobile application and fan engagement platform for Cruz Azul. Project includes mobile app development (iOS/Android), web platform, real-time analytics, and digital fan experience features.
digitalRFPs.query: (Football OR sports) AND (RFP OR tender OR "request for proposal" OR procurement) AND ("mobile app" OR "digital platform" OR website OR "web platform" OR "fan engagement" OR "digital transformation" OR CRM OR analytics OR "software development") NOT (construction OR infrastructure OR "physical facilities" OR building OR "job posting" OR hiring OR "staff recruitment" OR "equipment procurement")
